description.name: 38L Sand Blaster Pressure Tank
description.long_desc:
38L Sand Blaster Pressure Tank with accessories. Designed to work with items that do not fit into a sandblasting booth.


Product Features



  • Fixed leg ensures stability

  • Air supply valve & tank pressure gauge at air inlet

  • Supplied with 2,5m hose with on/off nozzle valve

  • 4 standard nozzle tips 2.3, 2.7, 3.0, 3.5 mm

  • Handles with rubber grips allow easy manoeuvering


Technical Data



  • Tank Capacity: 38 litre

  • Recommended Air Flow: 180 L/min at 5 bar

  • Working Pressure: 60-125 PSI

  • Air Requirements: 170-700 L/min

  • Hose Length: 2,5 m

  • 4 Ceramic Nozzle Tips: 2.3, 2.7, 3.0, 3.5 mm


Package Contents:



  • 1x Sandblaster Pressure Tank

  • 1x Humidity filter

  • 1x Shut-off valve

  • 1x Pressure gauge

  • 1x Filling funnel

  • 4x Ceramic nozzle

  • 2x 5,5" rubber wheels

  • 1x 2,5m hose

  • 1x Canvas blasting hood

  • 1x Teflon tape

description.name: 90L Sand Blast Cabinet
description.long_desc:
90L Sand Blast Cabinet helps quickly remove rust, paint and other unwanted debris from metal or wood surfaces. Suitable for blasting media such as glass beads, aluminium oxide, silicon carbide and silica sand.


Product Features



  • Top opening door

  • Built in rubber gloves

  • Fitted with a 12V internal fluorescent light

  • Includes trigger operated blasting gun with 4 assorted ceramic nozzles: 4, 5, 6, 7 mm


Technical Data



  • Cabinet Capacity: 90 litre

  • Window Size: 485 x 390 mm

  • Working Pressure: 80-100 PSI

  • Air Requirements: 140-560 L/min

  • 4 Ceramic Nozzle Tips: 4, 5, 6, 7 mm


Package Contents:



  • 1x Sandblaster cabinet

  • 1x 230V AC/DC adaptor

  • 1x Air hose

  • 1x Blasting media hose

  • 1x Blasting gun

  • 4x Ceramic nozzle tip

  • 4x Hose clamp

  • 4x Additional transparent film

  • 1x Teflon thread tape

description.name: 106L Dust Free Sand Blaster with Vacuum
description.long_desc:
Easy to use with trigger action sandblast gun. The brush head is pressed against the surface to capture and reclaim the abrasive and dust.


We recommend a minimum 400 L/min belt driven air compressor to run this sandblaster efficiently.


Product Features



  • Built in vacuum eliminates need for breathing aparatus

  • Separates abraisve from debris

  • Removable debris tank

  • 150mm rear wheels and castors


Technical Data



  • Tank Capacity: 106 litre

  • Reservoir Capacity: 80 litre

  • Vacuum Power: 1200W

  • Input Voltage: 230V / 50 Hz

  • Working Pressure: 80-120 PSI

  • Air Inlet: 1/2" - 18NPT

  • Hose Length: 2,5m

  • Air Requirements: 170-640 L/min

Robust and stable Hydraulic Trolley Jack 2,5T.

  • 2,5 tonne lifting capacity

  • 380 mm lifting height

  • Rubber pad for vehicle protection

  • Integrated carry handle

  • Two swivel castors to enable easy positioning

  • Two large steel wheels for better stability

  • Maximum Height: 380 mm

  • 1x Handle 50cm

description.name: Hydraulic Body Repair Kit 10T
description.long_desc:
Heavy duty Hydraulic Body Repair Kit for lifting, pushing, pulling, bending, straightening and spreading. Allows for bodywork structures to be returned to their original shape. Used for automotive, truck, farm and heavy equipment repair.


Product Features



  • 10 Ton hydraulic pump, ram and hose

  • Supplied with various tubes, end pieces and connectors


Technical Data



  • Load Capacity: 10 tonne

  • Cylinder Minimum Height: 355 mm

  • Cylinder Maximum Height: 490 mm

  • Max Lifting Height: 135 mm

  • Working Pressure: 62 MPa

  • Oil Be Filled: 500 g


Package Contents:



  • 1x 10 Ton hydraulic ram

  • 1x Hydraulic pump

  • 1x High pressure hose

  • 1x Flex head

  • 1x Ram toe

  • 1x Plunger toe

  • 1x Serpated saddle

  • 1x Wedge head

  • 1x 90 degree V-base

  • 1x Flat base

  • 4x Extension tubes: 100, 150, 300, 400 mm

  • Recommended Strut Spring Dia: 80 - 205 mm (80 - 145 mm, 100 - 205 mm)

  • Compression Length: 225 - 265 mm

  • Upper Yoke Positions: 7

  • Lower Yoke Travel: 320 mm
description.description:
Heavy duty strut coil hydraulic spring compressor. Ram bracket slides providing multiple height adjustment. Ideal for changing shock absorbers and working on MacPherson strut suspension units.


Product Features



  • Two sets of quick change yokes

  • Heavy duty steel construction

  • High speed hydraulic foot pump

  • Ram travel 325mm

  • Floor Mounted


Technical Data



  • Maximum Capacity: 1 tonne

  • Recommended Strut Spring Dia: 80 - 205 mm (80 - 145 mm, 100 - 205 mm)

  • Compression Length: 225 - 265 mm

  • Upper Yoke Positions: 7

  • Lower Yoke Travel: 320 mm

description.name: 20 Ton Shop Press with 2-Speed Hand Pump w/Gauge
description.long_desc:
Made from high quality steel with a powder coated paint finish to help corrosion resistance


Product Features



  • 20 tonnes of continuous pressing force

  • Smooth and safe operation

  • Single-acting cylinder that can deliver 257mm stroke through hand pump

  • Piston assembly is able to slide left and right

  • Large pressure gauge

  • Hard chromium-plated piston rod in pump

  • High strength powder coated steel H-frame

  • Adjustable working table offers eight height positions

  • Detachable pump and ram

  • Includes 2 press plates

  • Type: Hydraulic

  • Capacity: 20 tonne

  • Cylinder Stroke: 150 mm

  • Working Height: 8 positions

  • Gauge Included: Yes

  • Press Plates Dimensions: 190 x 100 x 25 mm

  • 1x Handle

description.name: 1000LBS Hydraulic Pick-up Truck Crane with Winch
description.long_desc:
GEKO Pick-up Crane is a hydraulically operated lifting crane with swivel function and is used for loading and unloading truck beds or for moving loads.


Product Features



  • Ideal for workshop use

  • Four pre-set positions for lifting: 1000 LB, 700 LB, 600 LB, 500 LB

  • Loading hook with chain

  • 360° rotating ring

  • Pump access from side

  • Dead man's lowering mechanism for safe handling of heavy loads


Technical Data



  • Lifting Capacity: 225 kg / 270 kg / 320 kg / 450 kg

  • Maximum Lift Height: 2000 mm

  • Length of Jib: 780 mm - 1300 mm

  • Weight: approx. 42 kg
